articles.title: A brief encounter, two attacks and then a break in investigations into the Brown and MIT shootings
articles.description: Investigators are still trying to figure out much of what Claudio Neves Valente was doing in New England in the weeks before they say he opened fire in a Brown University lecture hall and later killed a Massachusetts Institute of Technology professor
articles.content:
PROVIDENCE, R.I. (AP) — Just before Thanksgiving, Claudio Neves Valente checked into a Boston hotel and traveled to Brown University, where he had studied physics 25 years earlier.
The drive to Providence was short, and in the days that followed, the... [2818 chars]

articles.title: A tale of two cities: Delhi govt schools choke, private classrooms set up air filters
articles.description: Private schools in Delhi are addressing air pollution by using air-purifying technology and monitoring air quality, but this is only available to elite schools. Government and non-elite private schools lack resources to combat pollution. Data and studies show the harmful effects of Delhi’s polluted air, with experts recommending filtered ventilation for classrooms.

articles.description: SRMIST and NIFTEM sign MoU for academic collaboration, facilitating exchanges and joint research in food science and technology.
articles.content: SRM Institute of Science and Technology (SRMIST) signed an MoU with the National Institute of Food Technology, Entrepreneurship, and Management (NIFTEM), Thanjavur for academic and research collaboration on food science and technology. Both the insti... [338 chars]

articles.title: Stocks rise on Wall Street as AI stocks turn higher again
articles.description: NEW YORK — Stocks gained ground on Wall Street Friday for a second straight day, wiping away losses from earlier in the week. Technology stocks were once again the main force behind the market’s broader moves, especially companies with a focus on artificial intelligence. Both the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq closed out the week […]

articles.title: Reddit Down: Users Hit ‘CDN Unable To Reach Servers’ Errors - What You Can Do
articles.description: Reddit outage hits thousands with "CDN unable to reach servers" errors per Downdetector spike at 5:50 PM ET; app/site crashes amid possible Cloudflare overload—check status and fixes., Technology & Science, Times Now
articles.content:
Reddit is down for thousands of users worldwide, showing 'Our CDN was unable to reach our servers' errors starting around 5:50 PM ET Friday.
Photo : AP
Thousands of Reddit users hit error walls Friday as the platform buckled under "Our CDN was unable... [2976 chars]

articles.title: IIT Jammu hosts Int'l Conference on Sustainable Materials & Infra
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Dec 19: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Jammu successfully hosted the International Conference on Sustainable Materials and Infrastructure (ICSMI-2025) from 16th to 18th December. The three-day international conference was organized by the Department of Civil Engineering, IIT Jammu, in collaboration with the Indian Concrete Institute (ICI) Centre J&K and brought together leading academicians, researchers, industry experts, and practitioners from India and abroad to deliberate on sustainable construction technologies, eco-friendly materials, and innovative infrastructure solutions aimed at addressing […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Dec 19: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Jammu successfully hosted the International Conference on Sustainable Materials and Infrastructure (ICSMI-2025) from 16th to 18th December.
The three-day international confer... [2491 chars]

articles.title: Energy independence aligned with self-reliance, geopolitical compatibility: Dr Jitendra
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent NEW DELHI, Dec 19: Energy independence is no longer a matter of choice but an economic, strategic, and geopolitical necessity, said Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology and Earth Sciences Dr. Jitendra Singh, while adding that India’s transition towards clean and diversified energy sources is inseparably aligned with self-reliance and geopolitical compatibility, the vision of Aatmanirbhar Bharat and India’s expanding global role. Addressing an event in Delhi, the Minister said that debates on whether […]
